5.1.hd_quote: If the captain must, he goes down with the ship.
5.1.behavioral_axis: Maintains fixed natural rhythm as ritual despite external pressures, refusing interference with established patterns.
5.1.shadow_axis: Prematurely abandons rhythm when challenged, breaking ritual out of fear and cutting losses disastrously.
5.1.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

5.2.hd_quote: The ability to ignore the temptation to take premature action.
5.2.behavioral_axis: Naturally embodies fixed rhythm that others recognize and call out, maintaining composure without premature action.
5.2.shadow_axis: Projects stagnant rhythm that produces nothing, breaks ritual when comfort deteriorates into doubt about productivity.
5.2.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

5.3.hd_quote: Logic requires an enormous amount of imagination.
5.3.behavioral_axis: Experiments with rhythm through trial-and-error, using imagination to test whether patterns work without forcing change.
5.3.shadow_axis: Constantly breaks rhythm believing it's mistaken, repeats errors without surrendering to natural pattern.
5.3.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

5.4.hd_quote: Waiting as a guarantee of survival.
5.4.behavioral_axis: Externalizes fixed rhythm as contribution to humanity, transforming passive waiting into active creative achievement for survival.
5.4.shadow_axis: Breaks rhythm out of impatience to serve, denying own pattern with predictable costs to health and survival.
5.4.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

5.5.hd_quote: Enlightenment is a projection of those from the outside onto somebody else.
5.5.behavioral_axis: Holds steady under projection field of enlightenment, remaining calm within fixed rhythm as others project joy and mastery.
5.5.shadow_axis: Dismissed as illusion when calm fails to meet projections, disillusioned by waiting's failure to deliver enlightenment.
5.5.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks

5.6.hd_quote: Waiting is never free from pressure and is often punctuated by the unexpected.
5.6.behavioral_axis: Yields to universal flow despite pressures, accepting growth empowered by unexpected disruptions within fixed rhythm.
5.6.shadow_axis: Pulled into flow unexpectedly by societal demands, uncertain whether rhythm can truly lead to leadership.
5.6.source: Line Companion (Ra Uru Hu) via normalized chunks
